title: Advance123
author: Advance123
content: I'm a professional community manager. I have vast experience in this field that will help the community grow. I will help to attend to the community quarries and deleting of unsolicited messages from the community in your absence, as you may not be available to that always. Awaiting for your warm response as soon as you see this. Thanks..Daily work-(12-14) hoursIf Weekly peyment 25$If monthly payment 120$Telegram username:- @zixr3450Peyment accept:- Btc/eth/usdt or Other.Â Mate If you need please dm me.

comments.author: martha1
comments.body: You working 12 to 14 hours a day for 120$ ? damn man that's insane.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: martha1 on January 23, 2023, 10:17:25 PMYou working 12 to 14 hours a day for 120$ ? damn man that's insane. There are a lot of people in the world whose monthly income is lower than 100$. And working as a telegram community usually does not take all the time on free time community can do other freelance work. All the people in this forum are not rich and the value of time of all the members of the forum is not the same. And one more thing working with a lower budget can increase the value of the portfolio later the person can work at a higher rate.
